name: You don't know what you don't know
narrative: The story of how the Bitesize team created a quiz feature from their bedrooms, kitchens and garages.
author: Lucia Mormocea

name: Moving BBC Online to the cloud
narrative: Over the past few years, we in the BBC’s Design+Engineering team have completely rebuilt the BBC website. We’ve replaced a site hosted on our datacentres with a new one, designed and built for the cloud. Most of the tools and systems that power the site have moved too. We’ve used modern approaches and technologies, like serverless. And we’ve refreshed the design, approach, and editorial workflow, ready for the future. Hundreds of people have been involved, over several years. And it’s just about complete.
author: Matthew Clark

comments.name: Sakuranna
comments.message: Very insightful! Would love to know more about this migration, modernization project.
